Journal.Title: Psychogeriatrics : the official journal of the Japanese Psychogeriatric Society

Article.ArticleTitle: Detection of reduced dopamine transporter availability by 123 I-N-omega-fluoropropyl-2-beta-carbomethoxy-3-beta (4-iodophenyl) nortropane single-photon emission computed tomography in a patient of frontotemporal dementia with motor neuron disease.
